attributes.action: Stop using sentences such as “the people have spoken” and “I am on your side”
attributes.background:
16,141,341 voted to remain. 
28 per cent of people didn’t vote and young people who are now eligible to vote couldn’t. These slogans are divisive and offensive to those who wish to remain in the EU. If we (also the people) are ignored now, we will ignore parties using these in future elections.

rejection.details: The UK Parliament and Government are not responsible for the phrases that individuals use.
